009package Ch09_Automatic_Thresholding;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013
014import ij.ImagePlus;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
019import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
020
021/**
022 * <p>
023 * ImageJ demo plugin making available a selection of adaptive thresholders. See
024 * Sec. 9.2 of [1] for additional details. This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale
025 * images only. The original image is modified to a binary image.
026 * </p>
027 * <p>
028 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
029 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
030 * </p>
031 * 
032 * @author WB
033 * @version 2022/04/01
034 * 
035 * @see Adaptive_Bernsen
036 * @see Adaptive_Interpolating
037 * @see Adaptive_Niblack
038 * @see Adaptive_Sauvola
039 */
040public class Adaptive_All implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        enum Algorithm {
043                Bernsen(Adaptive_Bernsen.class), 
044                Interpolating(Adaptive_Interpolating.class),
045                Niblack(Adaptive_Niblack.class),
046                Sauvola(Adaptive_Sauvola.class);
047                
048                final Class<? extends PlugInFilter> pluginClass;
049                
050                Algorithm(Class<? extends PlugInFilter> cls) {  //constructor
051                        this.pluginClass = cls;
052                }
053        }
054        
055        private static Algorithm algo = Algorithm.Bernsen;
056        private ImagePlus im = null;
057        
058        /**
059         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
060         * is currently open.
061         */
062        public Adaptive_All() {
063                if (noCurrentImage()) {
064                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
065                }
066        }
067        
068        @Override
069        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
070                this.im = im;
071                return DOES_8G;
072        }
073
074        @Override
075        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
076                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
077                gd.addEnumChoice("Algorithm", algo);
078                
079                gd.showDialog();
080                if (gd.wasCanceled())
081                        return;
082                
083                im.unlock();
084                
085                algo = gd.getNextEnumChoice(Algorithm.class);
086                IjUtils.runPlugInFilter(algo.pluginClass);
087                
088//              IJ.runPlugIn(imp, algo.pluginClass.getCanonicalName(), null);
089        }
090
091}
